articles.title: Barbora Krejcikova wins French Open to claim maiden Grand Slam singles title - News24
articles.description: Barbora Krejcikova won her maiden Grand Slam singles title at the French Open, defeating Russia's Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova.
articles.content: Barbora Krejcikova won her maiden Grand Slam singles title at the French Open on Saturday, beating Russia's Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova to become the first Czech woman in 40 years to conquer Roland Garr… [+3877 chars]

articles.title: No mask, no helmet: Man, 24, arrested after appearing naked in public in viral videos - AsiaOne
